casebody.data:
(September 28, 1960)

Present — Bergan, P. J., Coon, Gibson, Herlihy and Reynolds, JJ.:

In the Matter of the Probate of the Will of Monroe L. Dix, Deceased. Elynor M. Dix et al., Appellants; David C. Anchin, Respondent. (2 Proceedings.)

)Motion for permission to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied, without costs.
